data.description:
The VRHealth portal includes a wide range of immersive applications, games and content enhancing the physical and cognitive well-being of users through fun and engaging VR experiences. 

While using the applications, performance data is collected, analyzed and quantified, using advanced algorithms, providing the user with performance insights for personal health tracking. 

To monitor all your XRHealth activities, track your performance and compare results over time -  contact us at www.xr.health.

*The Portal includes Medical Software

changelog.change_log:
Luna bug fixes
External Control Mirror improvements
Performance improvements

Guest user access has been cancelled 
Bug Fixes

Relax8 has now been FDA registered as Medical Software that assists in relaxation and self-management of pain and physical discomfort through distraction and supporting meditation and relaxation exercises.
Other then that we further improved performance and fixed all kinds of small bugs!

Compatible with External Control version 1.0.28 and up
Re-act is now an FDA registered application
Stability with external control substantially improved
Bug fixes

VAS added to Relax8
Bug fixes

1. Rotate - The application has been registered on the FDA website and is now available as medical software (RX only) for customers
2. This release solves performance issues
3. This release enable mirroring from multiple servers

This version includes an update to Unity 2019.
The main feature for this version is that this version enables Mirror on the tablet control for various network configurations.

This version now supports our new External Control App!
It also includes many bug fixes and performance improvements.
Hope you enjoy!

- Memorize app has joined the portal! ðŸ˜Š

- On-boarding process â€“ We added a short on-boarding for first time users!

- Media portal â€“ Media portal now plays both 360 and regular videos. For 360 you need to download the videos to your headset. Regular videos use streaming.

- Free calibration â€“ We added the option to calibrate the portal in any angle/lying position (user on his/her side, lying down, etc.). This works in the Portal, Re-act, Relax8 only. Memorize and Rotate work only in a regular sitting position. Luna has her own lying down feature (using the lying down button).

- Visual improvements â€“ environments look better in Relax8.

- Sound effects â€“ Many sound effects added improving the VR experience.

- Performance improvements!

- Bug fixes.
